name: Double a Letter Quiz | Word Play | 10 Questions

questions.text:
Example question: Halt - Bend down
Answer: Stop stoop.
In this example the letter 'o' was doubled.  There is no punctuation used in the answers.

Now it's your turn ...

Married - Pesky plant
questions.explanation:
Wed weed.

	Double the letter 'e' in wed to get weed.

questions.text: Wager - Plant in the amaranth family
questions.explanation:
Bet beet.

	Double the letter 'e' in bet to get beet.

questions.text: Number of years in a decade - A person aged between 13 and 19
questions.explanation:
Ten teen.

	Double the letter 'e' in ten to get teen.

questions.text: Hit with a stick as punishment in school (past tense) - Placed in a tin
questions.explanation:
Caned canned.

	Double the letter 'n' in caned to get canned.

questions.text: Police officer - A place to keep chickens
questions.explanation:
Cop coop.

	Double the letter 'o' in cop to get coop.

questions.text: Recorded onto a video cassette - Knocked quietly
questions.explanation:
Taped tapped.

	Double the letter 'p' in taped to get tapped.

questions.text: A young child - To blow a horn
questions.explanation:
Tot toot.

	Double the letter 'o' in tot to get toot.

Hoped hopped.

	Double the letter 'p' in hoped to get hopped.

Step steep.

	Double the letter 'e' in step to get steep.

Son soon.

	Double the letter 'o' in son to get soon.
